statements: SELECT * FROM StudentAchievements;
SELECT student_id, student_name, achievement FROM StudentAchievements WHERE award_name='Gold Medal';
SELECT student_name, achievement, award_date FROM StudentAchievements WHERE award_name='Silver Medal' ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, achievement, award_name FROM StudentAchievements WHERE award_date>'2022-01-01' ORDER BY award_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, award_name FROM StudentAchievements WHERE achievement='Sports' ORDER BY student_name ASC, award_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, achievement FROM StudentAchievements WHERE award_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY student_name ASC, achievement DESC;
SELECT * FROM StudentAchievements WHERE student_id IN (1, 5, 7) AND award_name LIKE '%Gold%' ORDER BY award_date DESC, student_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, achievement, award_name FROM StudentAchievements WHERE achievement LIKE '%National%' OR award_name LIKE '%Scholarship%' ORDER BY award_name ASC, student_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, COUNT(achievement) AS achievement_count FROM StudentAchievements GROUP BY student_id, student_name HAVING achievement_count > 1 ORDER BY achievement_count DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT student_name, achievement FROM StudentAchievements WHERE student_id BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY student_name DESC, achievement ASC;
SELECT * FROM academic_achievements
SELECT student_id, achievement_name FROM academic_achievements WHERE date_achieved > '2020-01-01'
SELECT achievement_name, student_id FROM academic_achievements ORDER BY student_id DESC
SELECT * FROM student_awards WHERE award_category = 'Sports'
SELECT award_name, award_date FROM student_awards ORDER BY award_date ASC
SELECT * FROM academic_achievements WHERE student_id = 1
SELECT achievement_name, date_achieved FROM academic_achievements ORDER BY date_achieved DESC
SELECT * FROM student_awards WHERE award_category = 'Sports' ORDER BY award_date ASC
SELECT student_id, achievement_name FROM academic_achievements WHERE date_achieved BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'

SELECT student_awards.award_name, academic_achievements.achievement_name FROM student_awards JOIN academic_achievements ON student_awards.student_id = academic_achievements.student_id WHERE student_awards.award_category = 'Academic' ORDER BY student_awards.award_date DESC
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, major FROM students WHERE graduation_year = 2022;
SELECT * FROM achievements WHERE achievement_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT student_id, COUNT(achievement_id) AS num_achievements FROM achievements GROUP BY student_id ORDER BY num_achievements DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, student_name, major FROM students WHERE graduation_year = 2022;
SELECT student_name, achievement_name, achievement_date FROM students JOIN achievements ON students.student_id = achievements.student_id;
SELECT student_name, award_name, award_year FROM students JOIN awards ON students.student_id = awards.student_id WHERE award_year > 2019;
SELECT student_id, student_name, major FROM students WHERE major = 'Computer Science' ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_id, student_name, major FROM Students WHERE graduation_year = 2023;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM Courses WHERE department = 'Computer Science';
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT award_name, award_date FROM Awards ORDER BY award_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, major, graduation_year FROM Students WHERE graduation_year = 2023;
SELECT course_name, instructor, department FROM Courses WHERE department = 'Computer Science';
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id JOIN Courses ON Courses.course_id = Grades.course_id;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM Students LEFT JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id LEFT JOIN Courses ON Courses.course_id = Grades.course_id WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT student_name, award_name, award_date FROM Students JOIN Awards ON Students.student_id = Awards.student_id WHERE award_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM Students WHERE student_gpa > 3.5;
SELECT course_name, course_credits, course_instructor FROM Courses WHERE course_credits >= 3;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade_received FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT student_name, award_name, award_date FROM Students JOIN Awards ON Students.student_id = Awards.student_id WHERE award_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM Students WHERE student_gpa > 3.5;
SELECT * FROM Courses ORDER BY course_credits DESC;

SELECT student_name, Courses.course_name, Enrollments.enrollment_date FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT student_name, grade_received, grade FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id WHERE grade >= 3.0 ORDER BY grade DESC;
